General.Name: Beijing Tieke Shougang Railway Tech Co Ltd
General.Description: Beijing Tieke Shougang Rail Way-Tech Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, and production of core accessories for railway construction in China. It provides rail buckle accessories; polymer materials, such as nylon and rubber products; technology promotion; sells building materials; imports and exports goods, technology, and agent; produces railways fastener systems, low relaxation prestressed steel bars, bridge bearing, prestressed steel wires, and general freight; inspects product quality; and professional contracting services. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Beijing, China.
